channel.title: [317] Objects
channel.description:
This has 2 questions in it.
#1 There are objects already set that I want to remove how would I do that? (Meaning they're not a makeGlobalObject)
#2 I'm making Theiveing and I need to make stalls work, as in take a stall that doesn't work and make it work. How would I do this?
